brief_description: This study will compare adult patients with CPP(chronic plaque type psoriasis ), who are currently not undergoing topical, systemic or biologic treatment and matched healthy controls. Baseline demographics and psoriasis history will be recorded. All PPP patients will be comprehensively phenotyped and psoriasis severity assessed including the body surface area (BSA) involved, Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI), Physicians Global assessment (PGA) and Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI).
brief_title: The immune signature of palmoplantar pustulosis
condition_studied: Patients with PPP compared to healthy controls (recruited also at the derm clinic).In addition, archived samples from healthy donors and patients with chronic plaque type psoriasis (CPP) will be included

hypothesis: PPP immune signatures differ from that of healthy individuals and from other more frequent forms of psoriasis
objectives: To identify transcriptional signatures in the blood of patients with palmoplantar pustulosis (PPP) and their modulation through in vivo stimulation with vaccination.
